However, if Wiki is right, Bob Marley has been dead for many many years. How can it be (once again) a (new?) live album? I think that all this was only collected from various old collections again.
Have I missed his last live performance?
nobody2007, it's not an Live recorded album, it's a verb: Live, Living... Bob Marley live forever :)

Recorded 30 years ago while Marley was touring in support of his album Uprising, Live Forever is Bob Marley’s last recorded concert. This never before released audio collection offers an incredible snapshot of one of music’s most influential performers.

I might be just a problem with my computer, but I downloaded it and it works and plays except it's not 20 tracks, It's two tracks, one for each cd. Anybody know why it's like this or is it supposed to be?
Thank you for the upload! But I recommend everyone to buy this excellent CD to show the companies that we want MORE Marley released!
